Viva Las Vegas!

In this update, the first hotel in a new region awaits you: the Diamond Peacock! This stunning neon-bathed venue in the middle of the Strip is opening its diamond doors to all lovers of night-time entertainment, good music, and re

Hey hoteliers!

Hot Season awaits in the new update! The area around your hotels is suddenly bursting into life, and people are flocking to see the incredible shows. You just need to win a series of victories in a row in order to meet your guests'

Welcome to Tokyo!

A new and incredible hotel on the top floor of the tallest skyscraper. It's breathtaking! The Royal Flower hotel combines technology and tradition!

Welcome to Tokyo!

A new and incredible hotel on the top floor of the tallest skyscraper. It's breathtaking! The Royal Flower hotel combines technology and tradition!

Hey hoteliers!

In the new update, we've fixed several bugs and also added localization for the following languages: Chinese Simplified and Chinese Traditional, Portuguese and Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Indonesian.

Hey hoteliers!

In the new update, we've fixed several bugs and also added localization for the following languages: Chinese Simplified and Chinese Traditional, Portuguese and Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Indonesian.

Welcome to France, hoteliers!

The incredibly beautiful Pearl Swan chateau, which is situated on a lake, awaits you. More than just a hotel, it is a fairy tale come to life!

In addition to adding a new hotel, we made several improvements

Welcome to California, hoteliers!

The Melody Breeze music-themed hotel opens its doors to all lovers of vintage music and cozy get-togethers.

Welcome to California, hoteliers!

The Melody Breeze music-themed hotel opens its doors to all lovers of vintage music and cozy get-togethers.

In this update, Ted is going to give gifts to our hotel guests – and he's setting up a whole workshop of holiday chores. We all need to work together and help him in this difficult but enjoyable task.
